title: Vi is cancer.
body: No skill champion that has to much CC and no counterplay.

replies.body: lol if ur going to complain i dont think vi is the way to go tbh
then this kid remembers that naut and his cc exists

Seriously, go cry more, Vi actually requires more skill than a lot of jglers (Yi for example) and has her ups and downs. She has a lot of CC yes, but that's all, what seems to be damage is just the amount of CC she deals, she can land a few AAs in there to deal more damage. She is pritty much a stronger Sion, but only a little stronger. She is perfectly balanced and can be countered if smart, it's just the free week talking!
Never thought about her being like a sion.. You're right. I like when I find champs like eachother, can't believe I didn't realise this one as vi is my main champ :P
Man why are you still posting on the boards. You're atrocious.
let the Tahm Kench eat you when Vi ults you. GGEZ

1. sivir
2. banshees veil
3. morgana blackshield
4. ward up so you can't get ganked easier
5. peel team
6. armour

so many more ways to counter her, don't be a bitch and complain
